item.title: Myfirst
item.description: Operational guidelines Install tools Install git bash Download Git installation package You can download the package in the web https://git-scm.com/downloads . Unzip and Install Configure git bash configure user name and email in the following way If configure success, you can enter git config -l, and verify that . Configure SSH key Generate SSH key Open Git Bash, enter ssh-keygen -t rsa -C â€œ275862458@qq.
